title: What are the factors that encourage pollution? - Quora

response.answer_text: Pollution, or more accurately, the acceptance or tolerance of pollution, are affected by several “forces.” If the levels of pollution are low enough to not pose a strong and immediate danger to any forms of life it’s exposed to, little effort would be justified for limiting the pollution. If a culture or civilization is too poor to be able to afford pollution controls, priorities of food, clothing, shelter and other basic survival needs will be higher than pollution controls. Just for starters. Hope that helps.
